name: Loudstars
tag_list: model, social-platform, modeling, photography, fashion, social-fashion, fashion-designer, modeling-industry, modeling-socal-network, social-modeling
overview:
Loudstars is the first and most exciting social platform for the modeling industry that brings together models, fashion designers, makeup artists, modeling agencies, fashion boutiques, industry experts, and modeling related companies all in one place.

This project is born because we feel models, all around the world, struggle and might find it hard to really connect with this enormous industry which have many paths to follow, but that might not be necessary the correct or the ideal one.

It was born to connect all the pieces together, because we understand that this industry is consist of not only models, but as well of fashion designers, photographers, makeup artists, modeling agencies, fashion boutiques, industry experts, and modeling related companies, glued together to form a one in this industry.
